mapper.select: SELECT category_id, category_name FROM COMMUNITY_CATEGORY ORDER BY category_id;

SELECT c.post_id, c.title, c.content, c.view_count, c.like_count, c.created_at, m.nickname, c.dong_code, d.dong_name, c.category_id, cc.category_name, (c.like_count * 3 + c.view_count * 1 + IFNULL(cmt.comment_count, 0) * 2) AS popularity_score FROM COMMUNITY c LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY cc ON c.category_id = cc.category_id LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m ON c.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG d ON c.dong_code = d.dong_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY post_id ) cmt ON c.post_id = cmt.post_id
c.deleted_at IS NULL AND c.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND c.dong_code = #{dongCode}
AND (c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY popularity_score DESC, c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, 8

SELECT c.post_id, c.dong_code, c.title, c.content, c.view_count, c.like_count, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.deleted_at, m.user_id, c.category_id, m.nickname, l.dong_name, l.gungu_name, cc.category_name, m.manner_score FROM COMMUNITY c LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m ON m.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY cc ON cc.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG l ON l.dong_code = c.dong_code
c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET comment_count = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL) WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT cc.comment_id, cc.content, cc.created_at, cc.updated_at, cc.post_id, m.user_id, m.nickname, cc.parent_comment_id, cc.group_id, cc.depth FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT cc JOIN MEMBERS m ON cc.user_id = m.user_id WHERE cc.post_id = #{postId} AND cc.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY cc.group_id DESC, cc.depth ASC, cc.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_COMMENT ( content, post_id, user_id, parent_comment_id, group_id, depth ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{postId}, #{userId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{groupId}, #{depth} )
